title:
Everywhere else I\'ve lived, if a person had some trees to get rid of, timber companies or even firewood companies were eager to buy them.  However, here I never hear of this unless the seller has a huge tract of land.



What is the least amount of trees companies will buy around here?
text:
Well,
it would depend on specific situations. I would suggest you might want
to contact some of the local tree services or timber buying businesses
who could give you an answer.
